Activities

Fitness

Group‑X

Buy a Pass

Be your best you.

Take an ordinary fitness class, spice it up with unlimited variety and add a healthy dose of support and encouragement. Think Zumba, yoga, cycling, cardio, strength and hardcore classes. That’s just a glimpse into all this group fitness program has to offer.

Fitness & Wellness

OK Next

Add some variety to your workouts.

Take an ordinary fitness class, spice it up with unlimited variety and add a healthy dose of support and encouragement. Think Zumba, yoga, cycling, cardio, strength and hard core classes. That’s just a glimpse into all this group can do for you and your morale.
